ComicInfo.Summary:
Just what the title implies: a satirical look at the past year.
Odds on how a celeb will bite the big one.

ComicInfo.Title: The Sopranos Family Circus; The Dumbest People, Events and Things of 2002; Mad's Celebrity Cause-Of-Death Betting Odds; Monroe and… Tinsel Teeth; Amazing Facts (and Surprising Discoveries) from the Human Genome DNA Project; The Controversial Artist Instruction School; A Mad Look at Security; Boston Pubic
